mapper.select: SELECT c."coursecode" AS courseCode, c."coursename" AS courseName, cat."categoryid" AS cat_categoryid, cat."categoryname" AS cat_categoryname, c."professorid" AS professorId FROM public."course" c INNER JOIN public."category" cat ON c.categoryid = cat.categoryid WHERE c."coursecode" = #{courseCode}

SELECT c."coursecode" AS courseCode, c."coursename" AS courseName, cat."categoryid" AS cat_categoryid, cat."categoryname" AS cat_categoryname, c."description" AS description, c.numberoflectures AS numberOfLectures, c."starttime" AS startTime FROM public."course" c INNER JOIN public."category" cat ON c.categoryid = cat.categoryid WHERE c."coursename" = #{courseName}

SELECT c."coursecode" AS courseCode, c."coursename" AS courseName, c."starttime" AS startTime, cat."categoryid" AS cat_categoryid, cat."categoryname" AS cat_categoryname, u."firstname" AS user_firstname, u."lastname" AS user_lastname, u."userid" AS user_userid FROM public."course" c INNER JOIN public."category" cat ON c.categoryid = cat.categoryid INNER JOIN professor p ON p.professorid = c.professorid INNER JOIN public."user" u ON p.userid = u.userid

SELECT c."coursecode" AS courseCode, c."coursename" AS courseName, cat."categoryid" AS cat_categoryid, cat."categoryname" AS cat_categoryname, u."firstname" AS user_firstname, u."lastname" AS user_lastname, u."userid" AS user_userid FROM public."course" c INNER JOIN public."category" cat ON c.categoryid = cat.categoryid INNER JOIN professor p ON c.professorid = p.professorid INNER JOIN public."user" u ON p.userid = u.userid INNER JOIN enrollment e ON c.coursecode = e.coursecode INNER JOIN student s ON e.studentid = s.studentid WHERE s."studentid" = #{studentId}
